name: TriAquae
summary: Open source IT batch management suite
short_description: TriAquae is an open source IT management software developed by Python language, this software allows IT administrator to manage Linux/Unix servers through a simple friendly command interface ,and with no any client program need to be install on the remote servers , only support SSH will be fine. User can send commands ,files,to mutiple servers and the result will be send back to management cosole almost in real time,it also can help user to analyze the system running capacity with the with nice looking report table.
